name: Hebbian Memory Hook
description: SQLite + semantic embedding memory system. Per-turn context injection with combined scoring (semantic similarity + activation + domain match), token-budgeted retrieval, retrieval bumps, and session mining.

semanticWeight.description: Weight for embedding similarity in scoring (default: 0.6)

domainWeight.description: Weight for domain keyword match bonus (default: 0.1)

embeddingCacheTtlMs.description: TTL for query embedding cache in ms (default: 300000)
